titles.title: Praise God the Father of Abraham

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise God the Father of Abraham
Who provided the Lamb to be slain. Praise God the Father
Of Righteousness, He's providing the Lamb once again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For there's a cry coming forth from creation. That touches
The heart of Father God. The echo of Isaac is heard
Through the land. Behold the fire and the wood.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Praise God the Father of Abraham, who provided the Lamb
To be slain. And from out of our innermost being we see
He's providing the Lamb once again.
